editorialSummary.text: Department store chain for deals on designer apparel, shoes & accessories, plus home goods & more.

originalText.text:
I ordered this shrit online in slim fit. After it arrived I removed the tags only to find out it was a classic fit. I returned it via mail, only to have it rejected and sent back to me with a hole in it. I called customer service and they put me on hold forever...

If any manager sees this and would like to refund my money or send me the correct shirt my order is #310532874

Case# 09427617

originalText.text: There are a lot of brand names to choose from such as bags, shoes, clothes, especially shoes on the 8th floor. Spend several hours here. Shoes discounted 30-40%, very impressive.

text.text: There are a lot of brand names to choose from such as bags, shoes, clothes, especially shoes on the 8th floor. Spend several hours here. Shoes discounted 30-40%, very impressive.

originalText.text: DO NOT SHOP HERE!!!! I was an avid customer for 10 years and recently ordered an item and when the item arrived it turns out it was a fake dress ( tags from the dress I ordered placed on a totally different item). I opened a case and automatically returned the item and then proceeded to wait a month. During that time no refund and no word from saks. Instead I received the item returned to me a month later saying the return was denied because an employee at the warehouse took off the tag to refuse the return even though I had a detailed case open. Spoke to customer service AGAIN and NOTHING. Apparently it’s my fault I gave them my money and their employees commit fraud. Save your money and purchase directly through the brands, their prices are not worth the hassle and there is a chance your item is a fake due to their lack of internal controls.

originalText.text: Avoid this store!  I ordered two rather expensive items in different colors, but in the package I found only one with a receipt for two.  I made a request for lost items, but 10 days have already passed and there is no result.  The support team said that they are investigating the case and may reject my request.  I'm shocked.  I have to pay out of my own pocket for the fact that one of the employees did not include an item in the parcel or, even worse, possibly stole my item.  And wait 15 days for their decision, even without an apology, as if it were my mistake.  Yes, it was my mistake to order from this store.  I’m going to the store today to return what I received, because in addition to everything, the description of the product on the website does not completely correspond to reality.

originalText.text: Never trust their delivery, the office of Saks OFF will never solve your problem if ordered item not delivered. And they are not even bothered to give any reason for that. We ordered women boots and this is what they call a proof of delivery (see photo). Some boxes in one big box and no background of my door or even street… We had to re-order the same boots, hoping that not delivered item will be refunded. But it was never done.
